test_name: should measure Lustre parallel I/O scalability

analysis.root_cause: The test runner's operating system (likely Windows, given the path C:\Users...) failed to resolve the hostname 'exascaler.ddn.local' to an IP address, indicated by the standard 'getaddrinfo ENOTFOUND' error. This prevents the initial network connection necessary to start the I/O test.

similar_error_docs.root_cause: DNS cannot resolve the DDN storage hostname. Either DNS server is not configured, hostname is incorrect, or /etc/hosts file is missing entry.

analysis.solution: 1. Verify the correct IP address of the 'exascaler.ddn.local' storage system. 2. Ensure that the test runner machine has proper name resolution configured, either by adding the hostname and IP mapping to the local hosts file (C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts) or by confirming the network DNS servers are correctly serving the internal '.ddn.local' domain.

metadata.error_message: java.net.UnknownHostException: exascaler.ddn.local: Name or service not known
metadata.root_cause: DNS cannot resolve the DDN storage hostname. Either DNS server is not configured, hostname is incorrect, or /etc/hosts file is missing entry.
